page.title: 07TRADE
page.content: {Kirkcaldy}is the main shopping centre for Fife, and the{High Street is the busiest shopping area. There are many different kinds of shops, although there aren't as many private shops as there used to be because many big companies have bought them. But the original buildings are still there, though the shop fronts have been modernized. There are chain stores and still some shops owned by local traders, such as{Pillans}(baker),{Brown's {Bazaar}(sports),{Rutherfords (chemist). There are shops to please everyone- D.I.Y.'s, Sports shops and takeaway food shops. Sometimes it is so busy, especially on Saturdays, that you cannot find a parking space, and you have to wait in queues for a long time to be served.
